mapper.select: select artical_id,title from artical where recommended = 1 and `status` = 1 limit 8;
select artical_id,title from artical where `status` = 1 order by lookCount desc limit 8;
select artical_id,title from artical where `status` = 1 order by commentCount limit 8;
select * from artical where artical_id = #{id} and `status` = 1;
SELECT artical_id,title from artical WHERE #{id} > artical_id AND `status` = 1 ORDER BY artical_id desc LIMIT 1;
SELECT artical_id,title from artical WHERE artical_id > #{id} AND `status` =1 ORDER BY artical_id LIMIT 1;

SELECT a.artical_id,a.commentCount,a.content,a.cover_image,a.create_time,a.is_comment,a.keywords,a.lookCount,a.menu_id, a.`status`,a.summary,a.sys_user_id,a.title,a.update_time from (artical as a RIGHT JOIN (SELECT artical_id from artical_tag WHERE tag_id = #{tagId}) as b ON a.artical_id = b.artical_id) where `status` = 1 LIMIT #{startRow},#{rows};
SELECT COUNT(*) from (SELECT a.artical_id,a.`status` FROM artical as a RIGHT JOIN (SELECT artical_id FROM artical_tag WHERE tag_id = 1) AS b ON a.artical_id = b.artical_id) AS c WHERE c.`status` = 1;
select * from artical where menu_id = #{menuId} and `status` = 1 limit #{startRow},#{rows};
select count(*) from artical where menu_id = #{menuId} and `status` = 1;
select * from artical where (title like "%"#{keyword}"%" or keywords like "%"#{keyword}"%") and `status` = 1 limit #{startRow},#{rows};
select count(*) from artical where (title like "%"#{keyword}"%" or keywords like "%"#{keyword}"%") and `status` = 1;
mapper.update: update artical set lookCount = lookCount + 1 where artical_id = #{id};
update artical set commentCount = commentCount + 1 where artical_id = #{articalID};
